H0.text: Between 1838 and 1839, against which country did France fight the so-called Pastry War. Mexico

H1.text: Between 1838 and 1839, against which country did France fight the so-called Pastry War. Brazil

H2.text: Between 1838 and 1839, against which country did France fight the so-called Pastry War. Argentina

H3.text: Between 1838 and 1839, against which country did France fight the so-called Pastry War. EUM

A4.text: The Pastry War (Spanish: Guerra de los pasteles; French: Guerre des Pâtisseries), also known as the first French intervention in Mexico or the first Franco-Mexican war (1838–1839)

A5.text: French forces captured Veracruz by December 1838 and Mexico declared war on France.
